isv.sap.payment.addon.facade

Interface AlternativePaymentFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlternativePaymentFacadeImpl

    public interface AlternativePaymentFacade
    A customization of existing PaymentFacade which defines methods related to Alternative payments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> makeSaleRequestForAlternativePayment(CartModel cart, java.lang.String paymentModeCode, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> optionalParameters)
      Makes sale (or initiate for Alipay) request for an alternative payment
      boolean validateAlternativePaymentResponse(AbstractOrderModel cart, java.lang.String alternativePaymentType)
      Validates if a response from alternative payment is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSaleRequestForAlternativePayment

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> makeSaleRequestForAlternativePayment(CartModel cart,
                                                                          java.lang.String paymentModeCode,
                                                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> optionalParameters)
        Makes sale (or initiate for Alipay) request for an alternative payment
        Parameters:
        cart - current cart
        paymentModeCode - code of payment method selected (must be one of PaymentType.ALTERNATIVE_PAYMENT)
        optionalParameters - optional parameters specific for concrete type of alternative payments
        Returns:
        redirect URL in case of success call

      • validateAlternativePaymentResponse

        boolean validateAlternativePaymentResponse(AbstractOrderModel cart,
                                           java.lang.String alternativePaymentType)
        Validates if a response from alternative payment is valid. This is reference implementation, for production more validation logic can/need to be added.
        Parameters:
        cart - AbstractOrder containing the transaction to validate
        alternativePaymentType - expected payment type
        Returns:
        true if transaction is valid (i.e. the same type, amounts are the same, etc.)
